article_text:
Reading Eagle: Tim Leedy | Dr. Ernie Post, director of Kutztown University's Small Business Development Center, discusses the executive pulse survey during an economic outlook breakfast Friday at the Abraham Lincoln hotel.

The numbers say Berks County's economy is healthy and growing, albeit at a slightly slower pace than other counties' economies.
